con:method.name: getCreatorCollection
con:method.con:description: Fetches lists of creators filtered by a comic id.

con:parameter.con:name: firstName
con:parameter.con:description: Filter by creator first name (e.g. brian).

con:parameter.con:name: middleName
con:parameter.con:description: Filter by creator middle name (e.g. Michael).

con:parameter.con:name: lastName
con:parameter.con:description: Filter by creator last name (e.g. Bendis).

con:parameter.con:name: suffix
con:parameter.con:description: Filter by suffix or honorific (e.g. Jr., Sr.).

con:parameter.con:name: nameStartsWith
con:parameter.con:description: Filter by creator names that match critera (e.g. B, St L).

con:parameter.con:name: firstNameStartsWith
con:parameter.con:description: Filter by creator first names that match critera (e.g. B, St L).

con:parameter.con:name: middleNameStartsWith
con:parameter.con:description: Filter by creator middle names that match critera (e.g. Mi).

con:parameter.con:name: lastNameStartsWith
con:parameter.con:description: Filter by creator last names that match critera (e.g. Ben).

con:parameter.con:name: modifiedSince
con:parameter.con:description: Return only creators which have been modified since the specified date.

con:parameter.con:name: comics
con:parameter.con:description: Return only creators who worked on in the specified comics (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

con:parameter.con:name: series
con:parameter.con:description: Return only creators who worked on the specified series (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

con:parameter.con:name: stories
con:parameter.con:description: Return only creators who worked on the specified stories (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

con:parameter.con:name: orderBy
con:parameter.con:description: Order the result set by a field or fields. Add a "-" to the value sort in descending order. Multiple values are given priority in the order in which they are passed.

con:parameter.con:name: limit
con:parameter.con:description: Limit the result set to the specified number of resources.

con:parameter.con:name: offset
con:parameter.con:description: Skip the specified number of resources in the result set.

con:representation.con:sampleContent: Too many values sent to a multi-value list filter.
